name: Key fields displayed on a panel should ALWAYS be display only (PeopleSoft)
description: This quality rules detects Key fields that are not "Display Only".
rationale:
Key field are not supposed to be changed by users.
A change will corrupt PeopleSoft repository.
reference:
https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E92519_02/pt856pbr3/eng/pt/tapd/task_SettingPageFieldPropertiesforControls-077512.html
Expand section 'Setting Use Properties, Press Enter to expand'.
remediation:
Turn "Display Only" as follow:  
Detect at page level all the keys of the differents records in the page. Access to Page Field Properties (right click on the field) and choose the menu "Use" and in the panel "Field Use Options" choose the property "Display Only".
alternativeName: Key fields displayed on a panel should ALWAYS be display only (PeopleSoft)
